name: Vergo Industrial 15/16” Extra Thick Anti Fatigue Mat - Heavy Duty Commercial Grade Diamond Plate Ergonomic Standing, Non-Slip Black with Yellow Anti Fatigue Floor Mat for Work, Shop (2-Pack 2' x 3')
short_description: COMMERCIAL GRADE - Built from industrial-strength material, Vergo’s anti-fatigue mat resists cuts, cracks, and tears for long-lasting durability. Ideal for kitchens, warehouses, workshops, assembly lines, and more—protecting both your team and your floors in demanding work environments.

SAFETY FIRST – Designed for workplace safety, our anti-fatigue mat features a diamond-plate textured surface for reliable traction and a non-slip base that stays flat without curling. A high-visibility yellow border and beveled edges clearly define work areas while reducing trip hazards in high-traffic environments.

ALL DAY COMFORT - Crafted with professional-grade, high-density memory foam, this ergonomic standing mat cushions your feet, legs, knees, and back to keep you comfortable through long shifts. Unlike low-quality mats that flatten, it maintains its shape, evenly distributes pressure, and relieves stress from your feet to your shoulders.

EASY TO USE – Arrives ready to use with a non-absorbent surface that resists liquids and stains for hassle-free cleaning. Dries quickly after cleaning, reducing downtime in fast-paced work environments.

VERSATILE - Engineered for a wide range of settings—retail, packing, manufacturing, automotive, workshops, warehouses, restaurants, and commercial kitchens—Vergo’s anti-fatigue mat delivers lasting comfort and support for anyone standing for extended periods.
DIMENSIONS - 2' x 3' x 15/16", 9 lbs.
product_details: Product Care Instructions General Cleaning: Sweep or mop with mild detergent

name: Ottomanson Heavy Duty Rubber Floor Mat – Non-Slip, Waterproof, Easy to Clean – Anti-Fatigue Mat for Commercial Kitchens, Restaurants, Workshops – Oil Resistant, Hose Washable – 24" x 36", Black
short_description: [PERFORATED DESIGN SUPPORTS DRAINAGE & LONG STANDING HOURS]: Open surface allows liquids to drain quickly and helps reduce fatigue during long shifts—ideal for industrial kitchens, restaurants, and commercial workstations.
[BUILT FOR INDOOR & OUTDOOR USE]: Durable rubber construction handles weather, spills, and mess—great for entryways, kitchens, patios, garages, or utility rooms.

product_description: Ottomanson rubber floor mats are built for real-life use—whether you're protecting entryways at home or improving safety and comfort in commercial settings. The collection includes residential mats for everyday indoor/outdoor use and anti-fatigue mats featuring a perforated surface that allows drainage and supports long-standing use in industrial kitchens, restaurants, and workshops. Made from waterproof rubber, the mat offers reliable slip resistance, stain protection, and easy maintenance. Whether you're covering a garage entry, patio doorway, or indoor workspace, it stays in place on tile, concrete, or wood thanks to its non-slip backing. Sized at 24" x 36", it's well-suited for compact placements such as under sinks, inside entryways, or tight utility zones—providing added traction and protection where it's needed most. Offered in a range of sizes for different needs, these mats are hose-washable, fade-resistant, and built to perform under pressure—indoors or out.
